attributes.action: financially support students/volunteers to go and help disadvantaged people/children in developing countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I myself am a student who wants to make a difference. I would love to help disadvantaged children in third world countries but the amount it costs to do that is impossible, and fundraising is very hard. I feel that students especially should be awarded the partial if not full amount needed for a voluntary trip/gap year/placement. Thank you.
